alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:51PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Weld and northwestern Morgan Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Briggsdale, or 27 miles northeast of Greeley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ault, Pierce, Nunn, Grover, New Raymer, Purcell, Keota, Briggsdale and Pawnee Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County
